name: turn
content:
Rotates a sprite or group of sprites by the selected amount. When used in a behavior, the turn command will give sprite the appearance that it is spinning.

## Artist
If this block is being used with Artist, then by default, the sprite that will turn is the artist, as no other sprites can be generated in an Artist lesson. Therefore, this block's Artist version does not allow you to choose which sprite to turn.

palette_params.name: sprite
palette_params.description: A sprite or group of sprites. Examples of blocks to attach here are [`sprite name`(#df9399)](/docs/spritelab/codestudio_spriteName/), [`costume`(#df9399)](/docs/spritelab/gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation/) and [`this/other sprite`(#df9399)](/docs/spritelab/gamelab_getThisSprite/).

palette_params.name: direction
palette_params.description: The direction the sprite will rotate, either "left" or "right".

palette_params.name: degrees
palette_params.description: The amount of rotation in degrees. An `integer` block can be used here or any other combination of blocks that produces a numerical value. Negative values will reverse the direction of rotation.
